title: Is Platform Engineering Really Just API Governance?
author: Jennifer Riggins
description: Does it matter if you call it platform engineering or API governance? Map out and standardize your APIs so they can be easily accessed internally and reused.
cntitle: 平台工程真的只是 API 治理吗？
cndescription: 平台工程或 API 治理，叫什么重要吗？绘制并标准化您的 API，以便在内部轻松访问和重复使用。
